QuestData.Title: Leaders of the Horde
QuestData.Description:
Saurfang has shown his true colors and now enlists the aid of the Alliance.
Meet with those who have remained loyal to the Horde. They are to ready themselves for the battle against our enemies.
And as for Eitrigg... bring him to Nathanos. A quick death is too lenient a punishment for his treachery.
Go, $n. Let us end this.
QuestData.LogDescription: Order the Horde leaders in Orgrimmar to prepare for battle.
